---

# Read data

```{r}
files <- list.files("../../data/sense", ".*.csv$", full.names = "TRUE")
```

```{r}
nice_names <- function(x){gsub(" ", "_", tolower(x))}
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv(files[1], skip = 1, col_types = cols()) %>%
  rename_all(nice_names) %>%
  mutate_if(is.character, tolower) %>%
  mutate(datetime = force_tz(df$datetime, "US/Mountain"))
```

# Plot

```{r fig_total_kwh}
ggplot(df %>% filter(name == "total usage"),
  aes(x = datetime, y = kwh)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point(color = "#F9461C") +
  theme_bw() +
  xlab("")
```
